pageTitle: Hosts | Hallen, Säle, Räume - für 40 bis 7.000 Gäste | Niedersachsenhalle A/B | Hannover Congress Centrum
textBeforeTable: 35,26 m, 22,40 m, 5,40 m Length, Width, Height 836,00 sqm Floor space Dimensions The only recently altered Niedersachsenhalle A consolidates high functionality with modern esthetics. The Niedersachsenhalle A, covered with parquet flooring and equipped with modern technical facilities, offers versatile usages. In order to create diverse spatial experiences the hall provides a separate steering mechanism for light, air and sound. Furthermore, the hall may be expanded by a linkage to the Niedersachsenhalle B. Moreover, the 28 conference rooms on the first floor may be used for workshops and seminars. Niedersachsenhalle A
textAfterTable: Niedersachsenhalle B The Niedersachsenhalle B is combinable with the Niedersachsenhalle A and is equipped with an in-built stage (w: 15.4 m d: 4.20 m).
